01602                         user = [self username];
01603                         pass = [self password];
01604                 }               
01605                 
01606         }
01607         
01608         // Ok, that didn't work, let's try the keychain
01609         if ((!user || !pass) && useKeychainPersistance) {
01610                 NSURLCredential *authenticationCredentials = [ASIHTTPRequest savedCredentialsForHost:[[self url] host] port:[[[self url] port] intValue] protocol:[[self url] scheme] realm:[self authenticationRealm]];
01611                 if (authenticationCredentials) {
01612                         user = [authenticationCredentials user];
01613                         pass = [authenticationCredentials password];
01614                 }
01615                 
01616         }
01617         
01618         // If we have a username and password, let's apply them to the request and continue
01619         if (user && pass) {
01620                 
01621                 [newCredentials setObject:user forKey:(NSString *)kCFHTTPAuthenticationUsername];
01622                 [newCredentials setObject:pass forKey:(NSString *)kCFHTTPAuthenticationPassword];
01623                 return newCredentials;
01624         }
01625         return nil;
01626 }
01627 
01628 // Called by delegate or authentication dialog to resume loading once authentication info has been populated
01629 - (void)retryUsingSuppliedCredentials
01630 {
01631         [[self authenticationLock] lockWhenCondition:1];
01632         [[self authenticationLock] unlockWithCondition:2];
01633 }
01634 
01635 // Called by delegate or authentication dialog to cancel authentication
01636 - (void)cancelAuthentication
01637 {
01638         [self failWithError:ASIAuthenticationError];
01639         [[self authenticationLock] lockWhenCondition:1];
01640         [[self authenticationLock] unlockWithCondition:2];
01641 }
01642 
01643 - (BOOL)showProxyAuthenticationDialog
01644 {
01645 // Mac authentication dialog coming soon!
01646 #if TARGET_OS_IPHONE
01647         // Cannot show the dialog when we are running on the main thread, as the locks will cause the app to hang
01648         if ([self shouldPresentProxyAuthenticationDialog] && ![NSThread isMainThread]) {
01649                 [ASIAuthenticationDialog performSelectorOnMainThread:@selector(presentProxyAuthenticationDialogForRequest:) withObject:self waitUntilDone:[NSThread isMainThread]];
01650                 [[self authenticationLock] lockWhenCondition:2];
01651                 [[self authenticationLock] unlockWithCondition:1];
01652                 if ([self error]) {
01653                         return NO;
01654                 }
01655                 return YES;
01656         }
01657         return NO;
01658 #else
01659         return NO;
01660 #endif
01661 }
01662 
01663 
01664 - (BOOL)askDelegateForProxyCredentials
01665 {
01666         // Can't use delegate authentication when running on the main thread
01667         if ([NSThread isMainThread]) {
01668                 return NO;
01669         }
01670         
01671         // If we have a delegate, we'll see if it can handle proxyAuthenticationNeededForRequest:.
01672         // Otherwise, we'll try the queue (if this request is part of one) and it will pass the message on to its own delegate
01673         id authenticationDelegate = [self delegate];
01674         if (!authenticationDelegate) {
01675                 authenticationDelegate = [self queue];
01676         }
01677         
01678         if ([authenticationDelegate respondsToSelector:@selector(proxyAuthenticationNeededForRequest:)]) {
01679                 [authenticationDelegate performSelectorOnMainThread:@selector(proxyAuthenticationNeededForRequest:) withObject:self waitUntilDone:[NSThread isMainThread]];
01680                 [[self authenticationLock] lockWhenCondition:2];
01681                 [[self authenticationLock] unlockWithCondition:1];
01682                 
01683                 // Was the request cancelled?
01684                 if ([self error] || [[self mainRequest] error]) {
01685                         return NO;
01686                 }
01687                 return YES;
01688         }
01689         return NO;
01690 }
01691 
01692 - (void)attemptToApplyProxyCredentialsAndResume
01693 {
01694         
01695         if ([self error] || [self isCancelled]) {
01696                 return;
01697         }
01698         
01699         // Read authentication data
01700         if (!proxyAuthentication) {
01701                 CFHTTPMessageRef responseHeader = (CFHTTPMessageRef) CFReadStreamCopyProperty(readStream,kCFStreamPropertyHTTPResponseHeader);
01702                 proxyAuthentication = CFHTTPAuthenticationCreateFromResponse(NULL, responseHeader);
01703                 CFRelease(responseHeader);
01704                 [self setProxyAuthenticationScheme:[(NSString *)CFHTTPAuthenticationCopyMethod(proxyAuthentication) autorelease]];
01705         }
01706         
01707         // If we haven't got a CFHTTPAuthenticationRef by now, something is badly wrong, so we'll have to give up
01708         if (!proxyAuthentication) {
01709                 [self cancelLoad];
01710                 [self failWithError:[NSError errorWithDomain:NetworkRequestErrorDomain code:ASIInternalErrorWhileApplyingCredentialsType userInfo:[NSDictionary dictionaryWithObjectsAndKeys:@"Failed to get authentication object from response headers",NSLocalizedDescriptionKey,nil]]];
01711                 return;
01712         }
01713         
01714         // Get the authentication realm
01715         [self setProxyAuthenticationRealm:nil];
01716         if (!CFHTTPAuthenticationRequiresAccountDomain(proxyAuthentication)) {
01717                 [self setProxyAuthenticationRealm:[(NSString *)CFHTTPAuthenticationCopyRealm(proxyAuthentication) autorelease]];
01718         }
01719         
01720         // See if authentication is valid
01721         CFStreamError err;              
01722         if (!CFHTTPAuthenticationIsValid(proxyAuthentication, &err)) {
01723                 
01724                 CFRelease(proxyAuthentication);
01725                 proxyAuthentication = NULL;
01726                 
01727                 // check for bad credentials, so we can give the delegate a chance to replace them
01728                 if (err.domain == kCFStreamErrorDomainHTTP && (err.error == kCFStreamErrorHTTPAuthenticationBadUserName || err.error == kCFStreamErrorHTTPAuthenticationBadPassword)) {
01729                         
01730                         // Prevent more than one request from asking for credentials at once
01731                         [delegateAuthenticationLock lock];
01732                         
01733                         // We know the credentials we just presented are bad, we should remove them from the session store too
01734                         [[self class] removeProxyAuthenticationCredentialsFromSessionStore:proxyCredentials];
01735                         [self setProxyCredentials:nil];
01736                         
01737                         
01738                         // If the user cancelled authentication via a dialog presented by another request, our queue may have cancelled us
01739                         if ([self error] || [self isCancelled]) {
01740                                 [delegateAuthenticationLock unlock];
01741                                 return;
01742                         }
01743                         
01744                         
01745                         // Now we've acquired the lock, it may be that the session contains credentials we can re-use for this request
01746                         if ([self useSessionPersistance]) {
01747                                 NSDictionary *credentials = [self findSessionProxyAuthenticationCredentials];
01748                                 if (credentials && [self applyProxyCredentials:[credentials objectForKey:@"Credentials"]]) {
01749                                         [delegateAuthenticationLock unlock];
01750                                         [self startRequest];
01751                                         return;
01752                                 }
01753                         }
01754                         
01755                         [self setLastActivityTime:nil];
01756                         
01757                         if ([self askDelegateForProxyCredentials]) {
01758                                 [self attemptToApplyProxyCredentialsAndResume];
01759                                 [delegateAuthenticationLock unlock];
01760                                 return;
01761                         }
01762                         if ([self showProxyAuthenticationDialog]) {
01763                                 [self attemptToApplyProxyCredentialsAndResume];
01764                                 [delegateAuthenticationLock unlock];
01765                                 return;
01766                         }
01767                         [delegateAuthenticationLock unlock];
01768                 }
01769                 [self cancelLoad];
01770                 [self failWithError:ASIAuthenticationError];
01771                 return;
01772         }
01773 
01774         [self cancelLoad];
01775         
01776         if (proxyCredentials) {
01777                 
01778                 // We use startRequest rather than starting all over again in load request because NTLM requires we reuse the request
01779                 if ((([self proxyAuthenticationScheme] != (NSString *)kCFHTTPAuthenticationSchemeNTLM) || [self proxyAuthenticationRetryCount] < 2) && [self applyCredentials:proxyCredentials]) {
01780                         [self startRequest];
01781                         
01782                 // We've failed NTLM authentication twice, we should assume our credentials are wrong
01783                 } else if ([self proxyAuthenticationScheme] == (NSString *)kCFHTTPAuthenticationSchemeNTLM && [self proxyAuthenticationRetryCount] == 2) {
01784                         [self failWithError:ASIAuthenticationError];
01785                         
01786                 // Something went wrong, we'll have to give up
01787                 } else {
01788                         [self failWithError:[NSError errorWithDomain:NetworkRequestErrorDomain code:ASIInternalErrorWhileApplyingCredentialsType userInfo:[NSDictionary dictionaryWithObjectsAndKeys:@"Failed to apply proxy credentials to request",NSLocalizedDescriptionKey,nil]]];
01789                 }
01790                 
01791         // Are a user name & password needed?
01792         }  else if (CFHTTPAuthenticationRequiresUserNameAndPassword(proxyAuthentication)) {
01793                 
01794                 // Prevent more than one request from asking for credentials at once
01795                 [delegateAuthenticationLock lock];
01796                 
01797                 // If the user cancelled authentication via a dialog presented by another request, our queue may have cancelled us
01798                 if ([self error] || [self isCancelled]) {
01799                         [delegateAuthenticationLock unlock];
01800                         return;
01801                 }
01802                 
01803                 // Now we've acquired the lock, it may be that the session contains credentials we can re-use for this request
01804                 if ([self useSessionPersistance]) {
01805                         NSDictionary *credentials = [self findSessionProxyAuthenticationCredentials];
01806                         if (credentials && [self applyProxyCredentials:[credentials objectForKey:@"Credentials"]]) {
01807                                 [delegateAuthenticationLock unlock];
01808                                 [self startRequest];
01809                                 return;
01810                         }
01811                 }
01812                 
01813                 NSMutableDictionary *newCredentials = [self findProxyCredentials];
01814                 
01815                 //If we have some credentials to use let's apply them to the request and continue
01816                 if (newCredentials) {
01817                         
01818                         if ([self applyProxyCredentials:newCredentials]) {
01819                                 [delegateAuthenticationLock unlock];
01820                                 [self startRequest];
01821                         } else {
01822                                 [delegateAuthenticationLock unlock];
01823                                 [self failWithError:[NSError errorWithDomain:NetworkRequestErrorDomain code:ASIInternalErrorWhileApplyingCredentialsType userInfo:[NSDictionary dictionaryWithObjectsAndKeys:@"Failed to apply proxy credentials to request",NSLocalizedDescriptionKey,nil]]];
01824                         }
01825                         
01826                         return;
01827                 }
01828                 
01829                 if ([self askDelegateForProxyCredentials]) {
01830                         [self attemptToApplyProxyCredentialsAndResume];
01831                         [delegateAuthenticationLock unlock];
01832                         return;
01833                 }
01834                 
01835                 if ([self showProxyAuthenticationDialog]) {
01836                         [self attemptToApplyProxyCredentialsAndResume];
01837                         [delegateAuthenticationLock unlock];
01838                         return;
01839                 }
01840                 [delegateAuthenticationLock unlock];
01841                 
01842                 // The delegate isn't interested and we aren't showing the authentication dialog, we'll have to give up
01843                 [self failWithError:ASIAuthenticationError];
01844                 return;
01845         }
01846         
01847 }
01848 
01849 - (BOOL)showAuthenticationDialog
01850 {
01851 // Mac authentication dialog coming soon!
01852 #if TARGET_OS_IPHONE
01853         // Cannot show the dialog when we are running on the main thread, as the locks will cause the app to hang
01854         if ([self shouldPresentAuthenticationDialog] && ![NSThread isMainThread]) {
01855                 [ASIAuthenticationDialog performSelectorOnMainThread:@selector(presentAuthenticationDialogForRequest:) withObject:self waitUntilDone:[NSThread isMainThread]];
01856                 [[self authenticationLock] lockWhenCondition:2];
01857                 [[self authenticationLock] unlockWithCondition:1];
01858                 if ([self error]) {
01859                         return NO;
01860                 }
01861                 return YES;
01862         }
01863         return NO;
01864 #else
01865         return NO;
01866 #endif
01867 }
01868 
01869 - (BOOL)askDelegateForCredentials
01870 {
01871         // Can't use delegate authentication when running on the main thread
01872         if ([NSThread isMainThread]) {
01873                 return NO;
01874         }
01875         
01876         // If we have a delegate, we'll see if it can handle proxyAuthenticationNeededForRequest:.
01877         // Otherwise, we'll try the queue (if this request is part of one) and it will pass the message on to its own delegate
01878         id authenticationDelegate = [self delegate];
01879         if (!authenticationDelegate) {
01880                 authenticationDelegate = [self queue];
01881         }
01882         
01883         if ([authenticationDelegate respondsToSelector:@selector(authenticationNeededForRequest:)]) {
01884                 [authenticationDelegate performSelectorOnMainThread:@selector(authenticationNeededForRequest:) withObject:self waitUntilDone:[NSThread isMainThread]];
01885                 [[self authenticationLock] lockWhenCondition:2];
01886                 [[self authenticationLock] unlockWithCondition:1];
01887                 
01888                 // Was the request cancelled?
01889                 if ([self error] || [[self mainRequest] error]) {
01890                         return NO;
01891                 }
01892                 return YES;
01893         }
01894         return NO;
01895 }
01896 
01897 - (void)attemptToApplyCredentialsAndResume
01898 {
01899         if ([self error] || [self isCancelled]) {
01900                 return;
01901         }
01902         
01903         if ([self needsProxyAuthentication]) {
01904                 [self attemptToApplyProxyCredentialsAndResume];
01905                 return;
01906         }
01907         
01908         // Read authentication data
01909         if (!requestAuthentication) {
01910                 CFHTTPMessageRef responseHeader = (CFHTTPMessageRef) CFReadStreamCopyProperty(readStream,kCFStreamPropertyHTTPResponseHeader);
01911                 requestAuthentication = CFHTTPAuthenticationCreateFromResponse(NULL, responseHeader);
01912                 CFRelease(responseHeader);
01913                 [self setAuthenticationScheme:[(NSString *)CFHTTPAuthenticationCopyMethod(requestAuthentication) autorelease]];
01914         }
01915         
01916         if (!requestAuthentication) {
01917                 [self cancelLoad];
01918                 [self failWithError:[NSError errorWithDomain:NetworkRequestErrorDomain code:ASIInternalErrorWhileApplyingCredentialsType userInfo:[NSDictionary dictionaryWithObjectsAndKeys:@"Failed to get authentication object from response headers",NSLocalizedDescriptionKey,nil]]];
01919                 return;
01920         }
01921         
01922         // Get the authentication realm
01923         [self setAuthenticationRealm:nil];
01924         if (!CFHTTPAuthenticationRequiresAccountDomain(requestAuthentication)) {
01925                 [self setAuthenticationRealm:[(NSString *)CFHTTPAuthenticationCopyRealm(requestAuthentication) autorelease]];
01926         }
01927         
01928         // See if authentication is valid
01929         CFStreamError err;              
01930         if (!CFHTTPAuthenticationIsValid(requestAuthentication, &err)) {
01931                 
01932                 CFRelease(requestAuthentication);
01933                 requestAuthentication = NULL;
01934                 
01935                 // check for bad credentials, so we can give the delegate a chance to replace them
01936                 if (err.domain == kCFStreamErrorDomainHTTP && (err.error == kCFStreamErrorHTTPAuthenticationBadUserName || err.error == kCFStreamErrorHTTPAuthenticationBadPassword)) {
01937                         
01938                         // Prevent more than one request from asking for credentials at once
01939                         [delegateAuthenticationLock lock];
01940                         
01941                         // We know the credentials we just presented are bad, we should remove them from the session store too
01942                         [[self class] removeAuthenticationCredentialsFromSessionStore:requestCredentials];
01943                         [self setRequestCredentials:nil];
01944                         
01945                         // If the user cancelled authentication via a dialog presented by another request, our queue may have cancelled us
01946                         if ([self error] || [self isCancelled]) {
01947                                 [delegateAuthenticationLock unlock];
01948                                 return;
01949                         }
01950                         
01951                         // Now we've acquired the lock, it may be that the session contains credentials we can re-use for this request
01952                         if ([self useSessionPersistance]) {
01953                                 NSDictionary *credentials = [self findSessionAuthenticationCredentials];
01954                                 if (credentials && [self applyCredentials:[credentials objectForKey:@"Credentials"]]) {
01955                                         [delegateAuthenticationLock unlock];
01956                                         [self startRequest];
01957                                         return;
01958                                 }
01959                         }
01960                         
01961                         
01962                         
01963                         [self setLastActivityTime:nil];
01964                         
01965                         if ([self askDelegateForCredentials]) {
01966                                 [self attemptToApplyCredentialsAndResume];
01967                                 [delegateAuthenticationLock unlock];
01968                                 return;
01969                         }
01970                         if ([self showAuthenticationDialog]) {
01971                                 [self attemptToApplyCredentialsAndResume];
01972                                 [delegateAuthenticationLock unlock];
01973                                 return;
01974                         }
01975                         [delegateAuthenticationLock unlock];
01976                 }
01977                 [self cancelLoad];
01978                 [self failWithError:ASIAuthenticationError];
01979                 return;
01980         }
01981         
01982         [self cancelLoad];
01983         
01984         if (requestCredentials) {
01985                 
01986                 if ((([self authenticationScheme] != (NSString *)kCFHTTPAuthenticationSchemeNTLM) || [self authenticationRetryCount] < 2) && [self applyCredentials:requestCredentials]) {
01987                         [self startRequest];
01988                         
01989                         // We've failed NTLM authentication twice, we should assume our credentials are wrong
01990                 } else if ([self authenticationScheme] == (NSString *)kCFHTTPAuthenticationSchemeNTLM && [self authenticationRetryCount ] == 2) {
01991                         [self failWithError:ASIAuthenticationError];
01992                         
01993                 } else {
01994                         [self failWithError:[NSError errorWithDomain:NetworkRequestErrorDomain code:ASIInternalErrorWhileApplyingCredentialsType userInfo:[NSDictionary dictionaryWithObjectsAndKeys:@"Failed to apply credentials to request",NSLocalizedDescriptionKey,nil]]];
01995                 }
01996                 
01997                 // Are a user name & password needed?
01998         }  else if (CFHTTPAuthenticationRequiresUserNameAndPassword(requestAuthentication)) {
01999                 
02000                 // Prevent more than one request from asking for credentials at once
02001                 [delegateAuthenticationLock lock];
02002                 
02003                 // If the user cancelled authentication via a dialog presented by another request, our queue may have cancelled us
02004                 if ([self error] || [self isCancelled]) {
02005                         [delegateAuthenticationLock unlock];
02006                         return;
02007                 }
02008                 
02009                 // Now we've acquired the lock, it may be that the session contains credentials we can re-use for this request
02010                 if ([self useSessionPersistance]) {
02011                         NSDictionary *credentials = [self findSessionAuthenticationCredentials];
02012                         if (credentials && [self applyCredentials:[credentials objectForKey:@"Credentials"]]) {
02013                                 [delegateAuthenticationLock unlock];
02014                                 [self startRequest];
02015                                 return;
02016                         }
02017                 }
02018                 
02019 
02020                 NSMutableDictionary *newCredentials = [self findCredentials];
02021                 
02022                 //If we have some credentials to use let's apply them to the request and continue
02023                 if (newCredentials) {
02024                         
02025                         if ([self applyCredentials:newCredentials]) {
02026                                 [delegateAuthenticationLock unlock];
02027                                 [self startRequest];
02028                         } else {
02029                                 [delegateAuthenticationLock unlock];
02030                                 [self failWithError:[NSError errorWithDomain:NetworkRequestErrorDomain code:ASIInternalErrorWhileApplyingCredentialsType userInfo:[NSDictionary dictionaryWithObjectsAndKeys:@"Failed to apply credentials to request",NSLocalizedDescriptionKey,nil]]];
02031                         }
02032                         return;
02033                 }
02034                 if ([self askDelegateForCredentials]) {
02035                         [self attemptToApplyCredentialsAndResume];
02036                         [delegateAuthenticationLock unlock];
02037                         return;
02038                 }
02039                 
02040                 if ([self showAuthenticationDialog]) {
02041                         [self attemptToApplyCredentialsAndResume];
02042                         [delegateAuthenticationLock unlock];
02043                         return;
02044                 }
02045                 [delegateAuthenticationLock unlock];
02046                 
02047                 [self failWithError:ASIAuthenticationError];
02048 
02049                 return;
02050         }
02051         
02052 }
02053 
02054 - (void)addBasicAuthenticationHeaderWithUsername:(NSString *)theUsername andPassword:(NSString *)thePassword
02055 {
02056         [self addRequestHeader:@"Authorization" value:[NSString stringWithFormat:@"Basic %@",[ASIHTTPRequest base64forData:[[NSString stringWithFormat:@"%@:%@",theUsername,thePassword] dataUsingEncoding:NSUTF8StringEncoding]]]];    
02057 }
02058 
02059 
02060 #pragma mark stream status handlers
02061 
02062 
02063 - (void)handleNetworkEvent:(CFStreamEventType)type
02064 {       
02065         [[self cancelledLock] lock];
02066         
02067         if ([self complete] || [self isCancelled]) {
02068                 [[self cancelledLock] unlock];
02069                 return;
02070         }
02071         
02072     // Dispatch the stream events.
02073     switch (type) {
02074         case kCFStreamEventHasBytesAvailable:
02075             [self handleBytesAvailable];
02076             break;
02077             
02078         case kCFStreamEventEndEncountered:
02079             [self handleStreamComplete];
02080             break;
02081             
02082         case kCFStreamEventErrorOccurred:
02083             [self handleStreamError];
02084             break;
02085             
02086         default:
02087             break;
02088     }
02089         
02090         [[self cancelledLock] unlock];
02091         
02092 }
02093 
02094 
02095 - (void)handleBytesAvailable
02096 {
02097         if (![self responseHeaders]) {
02098                 if ([self readResponseHeadersReturningAuthenticationFailure]) {
02099                         [self attemptToApplyCredentialsAndResume];
02100                         return;
02101                 }
02102         }
02103         if ([self needsRedirect]) {
02104                 return;
02105         }
02106         int bufferSize = 2048;
02107         if (contentLength > 262144) {
02108                 bufferSize = 65536;
02109         } else if (contentLength > 65536) {
02110                 bufferSize = 16384;
02111         }
02112         
02113         // Reduce the buffer size if we're receiving data too quickly when bandwidth throttling is active
02114         // This just augments the throttling done in measureBandwidthUsage to reduce the amount we go over the limit
02115         
02116         if ([[self class] isBandwidthThrottled]) {
02117                 [bandwidthThrottlingLock lock];
02118                 if (maxBandwidthPerSecond > 0) {
02119                         long long maxSize  = (long long)maxBandwidthPerSecond-(long long)bandwidthUsedInLastSecond;
02120                         if (maxSize < 0) {
02121                                 // We aren't supposed to read any more data right now, but we'll read a single byte anyway so the CFNetwork's buffer isn't full
02122                                 bufferSize = 1;
02123                         } else if (maxSize/4 < bufferSize) {
02124                                 // We were going to fetch more data that we should be allowed, so we'll reduce the size of our read
02125                                 bufferSize = maxSize/4;
02126                         }
02127                 }
02128                 if (bufferSize < 1) {
02129                         bufferSize = 1;
02130                 }
02131                 [bandwidthThrottlingLock unlock];
02132         }
02133         
02134         
02135         
02136     UInt8 buffer[bufferSize];
02137     CFIndex bytesRead = CFReadStreamRead(readStream, buffer, sizeof(buffer));
02138 
02139         
02140     // Less than zero is an error
02141     if (bytesRead < 0) {
02142         [self handleStreamError];
02143                 
02144         // If zero bytes were read, wait for the EOF to come.
02145     } else if (bytesRead) {
02146                 
02147                 [self setTotalBytesRead:[self totalBytesRead]+bytesRead];
02148                 [self setLastActivityTime:[NSDate date]];
02149                 
02150                 // For bandwidth measurement / throttling
02151                 [ASIHTTPRequest incrementBandwidthUsedInLastSecond:bytesRead];
02152                 
02153                 // Are we downloading to a file?
02154                 if ([self downloadDestinationPath]) {
02155                         if (![self fileDownloadOutputStream]) {
02156                                 BOOL append = NO;
02157                                 if (![self temporaryFileDownloadPath]) {
02158                                         [self setTemporaryFileDownloadPath:[NSTemporaryDirectory() stringByAppendingPathComponent:[[NSProcessInfo processInfo] globallyUniqueString]]];
02159                                 } else if ([self allowResumeForFileDownloads]) {
02160                                         append = YES;
02161                                 }
02162                                 
02163                                 [self setFileDownloadOutputStream:[[[NSOutputStream alloc] initToFileAtPath:[self temporaryFileDownloadPath] append:append] autorelease]];
02164                                 [[self fileDownloadOutputStream] open];
02165                         }
02166                         [[self fileDownloadOutputStream] write:buffer maxLength:bytesRead];
02167                         
02168                 //Otherwise, let's add the data to our in-memory store
02169                 } else {
02170                         [rawResponseData appendBytes:buffer length:bytesRead];
02171                 }
02172     }
02173 }
02174 
02175 - (void)handleStreamComplete
02176 {       
02177         //Try to read the headers (if this is a HEAD request handleBytesAvailable may not be called)
02178         if (![self responseHeaders]) {
02179                 if ([self readResponseHeadersReturningAuthenticationFailure]) {
02180                         [self attemptToApplyCredentialsAndResume];
02181                         return;
02182                 }
02183         }
02184         if ([self needsRedirect]) {
02185                 return;
02186         }
02187         [progressLock lock];    
02188         
02189         [self setComplete:YES];
02190         [self updateProgressIndicators];
02191         
02192     if (readStream) {
02193                 CFReadStreamSetClient(readStream, kCFStreamEventNone, NULL, NULL);
02194                 CFReadStreamUnscheduleFromRunLoop(readStream, CFRunLoopGetCurrent(), ASIHTTPRequestRunMode);
02195                 CFReadStreamClose(readStream);
02196                 CFRelease(readStream);
02197                 readStream = NULL;
02198     }
02199         
02200         [[self postBodyReadStream] close];
02201         
02202         NSError *fileError = nil;
02203         
02204         // Delete up the request body temporary file, if it exists
02205         if ([self didCreateTemporaryPostDataFile]) {
02206                 [self removePostDataFile];
02207         }
02208         
02209         // Close the output stream as we're done writing to the file
02210         if ([self temporaryFileDownloadPath]) {
02211                 [[self fileDownloadOutputStream] close];
02212                 
02213                 // Decompress the file (if necessary) directly to the destination path
02214                 if ([self isResponseCompressed]) {
02215                         int decompressionStatus = [ASIHTTPRequest uncompressZippedDataFromFile:[self temporaryFileDownloadPath] toFile:[self downloadDestinationPath]];
02216                         if (decompressionStatus != Z_OK) {
02217                                 fileError = [NSError errorWithDomain:NetworkRequestErrorDomain code:ASIFileManagementError userInfo:[NSDictionary dictionaryWithObjectsAndKeys:[NSString stringWithFormat:@"Decompression of %@ failed with code %hi",[self temporaryFileDownloadPath],decompressionStatus],NSLocalizedDescriptionKey,nil]];
02218                         }
02219                                 
02220                         [self removeTemporaryDownloadFile];
02221                 } else {
02222                                         
02223                         //Remove any file at the destination path
02224                         NSError *moveError = nil;
02225                         if ([[NSFileManager defaultManager] fileExistsAtPath:[self downloadDestinationPath]]) {
02226                                 [[NSFileManager defaultManager] removeItemAtPath:[self downloadDestinationPath] error:&moveError];
02227                                 if (moveError) {
02228                                         fileError = [NSError errorWithDomain:NetworkRequestErrorDomain code:ASIFileManagementError userInfo:[NSDictionary dictionaryWithObjectsAndKeys:[NSString stringWithFormat:@"Unable to remove file at path '%@'",[self downloadDestinationPath]],NSLocalizedDescriptionKey,moveError,NSUnderlyingErrorKey,nil]];
02229                                 }
02230                         }
02231                                         
02232                         //Move the temporary file to the destination path
02233                         if (!fileError) {
02234                                 [[NSFileManager defaultManager] moveItemAtPath:[self temporaryFileDownloadPath] toPath:[self downloadDestinationPath] error:&moveError];
02235                                 if (moveError) {
02236                                         fileError = [NSError errorWithDomain:NetworkRequestErrorDomain code:ASIFileManagementError userInfo:[NSDictionary dictionaryWithObjectsAndKeys:[NSString stringWithFormat:@"Failed to move file from '%@' to '%@'",[self temporaryFileDownloadPath],[self downloadDestinationPath]],NSLocalizedDescriptionKey,moveError,NSUnderlyingErrorKey,nil]];
02237                                 }
02238                                 [self setTemporaryFileDownloadPath:nil];
02239                         }
02240                 }
02241         }
02242         [progressLock unlock];
02243         
02244         if (fileError) {
02245                 [self failWithError:fileError];
02246         } else {
02247                 [self requestFinished];
02248         }
02249 }
02250 
02251 
02252 - (void)handleStreamError
02253 {
02254         NSError *underlyingError = [(NSError *)CFReadStreamCopyError(readStream) autorelease];
02255         
02256         [self cancelLoad];
02257         [self setComplete:YES];
02258         
02259         if (![self error]) { // We may already have handled this error
02260                 
02261                 
02262                 NSString *reason = @"A connection failure occurred";
02263                 
02264                 // We'll use a custom error message for SSL errors, but you should always check underlying error if you want more details
02265                 // For some reason SecureTransport.h doesn't seem to be available on iphone, so error codes hard-coded
02266                 // Also, iPhone seems to handle errors differently from Mac OS X - a self-signed certificate returns a different error code on each platform, so we'll just provide a general error
02267                 if ([[underlyingError domain] isEqualToString:NSOSStatusErrorDomain]) {
02268                         if ([underlyingError code] <= -9800 && [underlyingError code] >= -9818) {
02269                                 reason = [NSString stringWithFormat:@"%@: SSL problem (possibily a bad/expired/self-signed certificate)",reason];
02270                         }
02271                 }
02272                 
02273                 [self failWithError:[NSError errorWithDomain:NetworkRequestErrorDomain code:ASIConnectionFailureErrorType userInfo:[NSDictionary dictionaryWithObjectsAndKeys:reason,NSLocalizedDescriptionKey,underlyingError,NSUnderlyingErrorKey,nil]]];
02274         }
02275         
02276 }
02277 
02278 #pragma mark global queue
02279 
02280 + (NSOperationQueue *)sharedRequestQueue
02281 {
02282         if (!sharedRequestQueue) {
02283                 sharedRequestQueue = [[NSOperationQueue alloc] init];
02284                 [sharedRequestQueue setMaxConcurrentOperationCount:4];
02285         }
02286         return sharedRequestQueue;
02287 }
02288 
02289 # pragma mark session credentials
02290 
02291 + (NSMutableArray *)sessionProxyCredentialsStore
02292 {
02293         if (!sessionProxyCredentialsStore) {
02294                 sessionProxyCredentialsStore = [[NSMutableArray alloc] init];
02295         }
02296         return sessionProxyCredentialsStore;
02297 }
02298 
02299 + (NSMutableArray *)sessionCredentialsStore
02300 {
02301         if (!sessionCredentialsStore) {
02302                 sessionCredentialsStore = [[NSMutableArray alloc] init];
02303         }
02304         return sessionCredentialsStore;
02305 }
02306 
02307 + (void)storeProxyAuthenticationCredentialsInSessionStore:(NSDictionary *)credentials
02308 {
02309         [sessionCredentialsLock lock];
02310         [self removeProxyAuthenticationCredentialsFromSessionStore:[credentials objectForKey:@"Credentials"]];
02311         [[[self class] sessionProxyCredentialsStore] addObject:credentials];
02312         [sessionCredentialsLock unlock];
02313 }
02314 
02315 + (void)storeAuthenticationCredentialsInSessionStore:(NSDictionary *)credentials
02316 {
02317         [sessionCredentialsLock lock];
02318         [self removeAuthenticationCredentialsFromSessionStore:[credentials objectForKey:@"Credentials"]];
02319         [[[self class] sessionCredentialsStore] addObject:credentials];
02320         [sessionCredentialsLock unlock];
02321 }
02322 
02323 + (void)removeProxyAuthenticationCredentialsFromSessionStore:(NSDictionary *)credentials
02324 {
02325         [sessionCredentialsLock lock];
02326         NSMutableArray *sessionCredentialsList = [[self class] sessionProxyCredentialsStore];
02327         int i;
02328         for (i=0; i<[sessionCredentialsList count]; i++) {
02329                 NSDictionary *theCredentials = [sessionCredentialsList objectAtIndex:i];
02330                 if ([theCredentials objectForKey:@"Credentials"] == credentials) {
02331                         [sessionCredentialsList removeObjectAtIndex:i];
02332                         [sessionCredentialsLock unlock];
02333                         return;
02334                 }
02335         }
02336         [sessionCredentialsLock unlock];
02337 }
02338 
02339 + (void)removeAuthenticationCredentialsFromSessionStore:(NSDictionary *)credentials
02340 {
02341         [sessionCredentialsLock lock];
02342         NSMutableArray *sessionCredentialsList = [[self class] sessionCredentialsStore];
02343         int i;
02344         for (i=0; i<[sessionCredentialsList count]; i++) {
02345                 NSDictionary *theCredentials = [sessionCredentialsList objectAtIndex:i];
02346                 if ([theCredentials objectForKey:@"Credentials"] == credentials) {
02347                         [sessionCredentialsList removeObjectAtIndex:i];
02348                         [sessionCredentialsLock unlock];
02349                         return;
02350                 }
02351         }
02352         [sessionCredentialsLock unlock];
02353 }
02354 
02355 - (NSDictionary *)findSessionProxyAuthenticationCredentials
02356 {
02357         [sessionCredentialsLock lock];
02358         NSMutableArray *sessionCredentialsList = [[self class] sessionProxyCredentialsStore];
02359         for (NSDictionary *theCredentials in sessionCredentialsList) {
02360                 if ([[theCredentials objectForKey:@"Host"] isEqualToString:[self proxyHost]] && [[theCredentials objectForKey:@"Port"] intValue] == [self proxyPort]) {
02361                         [sessionCredentialsLock unlock];
02362                         return theCredentials;
02363                 }
02364         }
02365         [sessionCredentialsLock unlock];
02366         return nil;
02367 }
02368 
02369 
02370 - (NSDictionary *)findSessionAuthenticationCredentials
02371 {
02372         [sessionCredentialsLock lock];
02373         NSMutableArray *sessionCredentialsList = [[self class] sessionCredentialsStore];
02374         // Find an exact match (same url)
02375         for (NSDictionary *theCredentials in sessionCredentialsList) {
02376                 if ([[theCredentials objectForKey:@"URL"] isEqual:[self url]]) {
02377                         // /Just a sanity check to ensure we never choose credentials from a different realm. Can't really do more than that, as either this request or the stored credentials may not have a realm when the other does
02378                         if (![self responseStatusCode] || (![theCredentials objectForKey:@"AuthenticationRealm"] || [[theCredentials objectForKey:@"AuthenticationRealm"] isEqualToString:[self authenticationRealm]])) {
02379                                 [sessionCredentialsLock unlock];
02380                                 return theCredentials;
02381                         }
02382                 }
02383         }
02384         // Find a rough match (same host, port, scheme)
02385         NSURL *requestURL = [self url];
02386         for (NSDictionary *theCredentials in sessionCredentialsList) {
02387                 NSURL *theURL = [theCredentials objectForKey:@"URL"];
02388                 
02389                 // Port can be nil!
02390                 if ([[theURL host] isEqualToString:[requestURL host]] && ([theURL port] == [requestURL port] || [[theURL port] isEqualToNumber:[requestURL port]]) && [[theURL scheme] isEqualToString:[requestURL scheme]]) {
02391                         if (![self responseStatusCode] || (![theCredentials objectForKey:@"AuthenticationRealm"] || [[theCredentials objectForKey:@"AuthenticationRealm"] isEqualToString:[self authenticationRealm]])) {
02392                                 [sessionCredentialsLock unlock];
02393                                 return theCredentials;
02394                         }
02395                 }
02396         }
02397         [sessionCredentialsLock unlock];
02398         return nil;
02399 }
02400 
02401 #pragma mark keychain storage
02402 
02403 + (void)saveCredentials:(NSURLCredential *)credentials forHost:(NSString *)host port:(int)port protocol:(NSString *)protocol realm:(NSString *)realm
02404 {
02405         NSURLProtectionSpace *protectionSpace = [[[NSURLProtectionSpace alloc] initWithHost:host port:port protocol:protocol realm:realm authenticationMethod:NSURLAuthenticationMethodDefault] autorelease];
02406         [[NSURLCredentialStorage sharedCredentialStorage] setDefaultCredential:credentials forProtectionSpace:protectionSpace];
02407 }

02410 {
02411         NSURLProtectionSpace *protectionSpace = [[[NSURLProtectionSpace alloc] initWithProxyHost:host port:port type:NSURLProtectionSpaceHTTPProxy realm:realm authenticationMethod:NSURLAuthenticationMethodDefault] autorelease];
02412         [[NSURLCredentialStorage sharedCredentialStorage] setDefaultCredential:credentials forProtectionSpace:protectionSpace];

02427 + (void)removeCredentialsForHost:(NSString *)host port:(int)port protocol:(NSString *)protocol realm:(NSString *)realm

02431         if (credential) {
02432                 [[NSURLCredentialStorage sharedCredentialStorage] removeCredential:credential forProtectionSpace:protectionSpace];
02433         }
02434 }

02444 
02445 
02446 + (NSMutableArray *)sessionCookies
02447 {
02448         if (!sessionCookies) {
02449                 [ASIHTTPRequest setSessionCookies:[[[NSMutableArray alloc] init] autorelease]];
02450         }
02451         return sessionCookies;
02452 }
02453 
02454 + (void)setSessionCookies:(NSMutableArray *)newSessionCookies
02455 {
02456         [sessionCookiesLock lock];
02457         // Remove existing cookies from the persistent store
02458         for (NSHTTPCookie *cookie in sessionCookies) {
02459                 [[NSHTTPCookieStorage sharedHTTPCookieStorage] deleteCookie:cookie];
02460         }
02461         [sessionCookies release];
02462         sessionCookies = [newSessionCookies retain];
02463         [sessionCookiesLock unlock];
02464 }
02465 
02466 + (void)addSessionCookie:(NSHTTPCookie *)newCookie
02467 {
02468         [sessionCookiesLock lock];
02469         NSHTTPCookie *cookie;
02470         int i;
02471         int max = [[ASIHTTPRequest sessionCookies] count];
02472         for (i=0; i<max; i++) {
02473                 cookie = [[ASIHTTPRequest sessionCookies] objectAtIndex:i];
02474                 if ([[cookie domain] isEqualToString:[newCookie domain]] && [[cookie path] isEqualToString:[newCookie path]] && [[cookie name] isEqualToString:[newCookie name]]) {
02475                         [[ASIHTTPRequest sessionCookies] removeObjectAtIndex:i];
02476                         break;
02477                 }
02478         }
02479         [[ASIHTTPRequest sessionCookies] addObject:newCookie];
02480         [sessionCookiesLock unlock];
02481 }
02482 
02483 // Dump all session data (authentication and cookies)
02484 + (void)clearSession
02485 {
02486         [sessionCredentialsLock lock];
02487         [[[self class] sessionCredentialsStore] removeAllObjects];
02488         [sessionCredentialsLock unlock];
02489         [[self class] setSessionCookies:nil];
02490 }
02491 
02492 #pragma mark gzip decompression
02493 
02494 //
02495 // Contributed by Shaun Harrison of Enormego, see: http://developers.enormego.com/view/asihttprequest_gzip
02496 // Based on this: http://deusty.blogspot.com/2007/07/gzip-compressiondecompression.html
02497 //
02498 + (NSData *)uncompressZippedData:(NSData*)compressedData
02499 {
02500         if ([compressedData length] == 0) return compressedData;
02501         
02502         unsigned full_length = [compressedData length];
02503         unsigned half_length = [compressedData length] / 2;
02504         
02505         NSMutableData *decompressed = [NSMutableData dataWithLength: full_length + half_length];
02506         BOOL done = NO;
02507         int status;
02508         
02509         z_stream strm;
02510         strm.next_in = (Bytef *)[compressedData bytes];
02511         strm.avail_in = [compressedData length];
02512         strm.total_out = 0;
02513         strm.zalloc = Z_NULL;
02514         strm.zfree = Z_NULL;
02515         
02516         if (inflateInit2(&strm, (15+32)) != Z_OK) return nil;
02517         
02518         while (!done) {
02519                 // Make sure we have enough room and reset the lengths.
02520                 if (strm.total_out >= [decompressed length]) {
02521                         [decompressed increaseLengthBy: half_length];
02522                 }
02523                 strm.next_out = [decompressed mutableBytes] + strm.total_out;
02524                 strm.avail_out = [decompressed length] - strm.total_out;
02525                 
02526                 // Inflate another chunk.
02527                 status = inflate (&strm, Z_SYNC_FLUSH);
02528                 if (status == Z_STREAM_END) {
02529                         done = YES;
02530                 } else if (status != Z_OK) {
02531                         break;
02532                 }
02533         }
02534         if (inflateEnd (&strm) != Z_OK) return nil;
02535         
02536         // Set real length.
02537         if (done) {
02538                 [decompressed setLength: strm.total_out];
02539                 return [NSData dataWithData: decompressed];
02540         } else {
02541                 return nil;
02542         }
02543 }
02544 
02545 // NOTE: To debug this method, turn off Data Formatters in Xcode or you'll crash on closeFile
02546 + (int)uncompressZippedDataFromFile:(NSString *)sourcePath toFile:(NSString *)destinationPath
02547 {
02548         // Create an empty file at the destination path
02549         if (![[NSFileManager defaultManager] createFileAtPath:destinationPath contents:[NSData data] attributes:nil]) {
02550                 return 1;
02551         }
02552         
02553         // Get a FILE struct for the source file
02554         NSFileHandle *inputFileHandle = [NSFileHandle fileHandleForReadingAtPath:sourcePath];
02555         FILE *source = fdopen([inputFileHandle fileDescriptor], "r");
02556         
02557         // Get a FILE struct for the destination path
02558         NSFileHandle *outputFileHandle = [NSFileHandle fileHandleForWritingAtPath:destinationPath];
02559         FILE *dest = fdopen([outputFileHandle fileDescriptor], "w");
02560         
02561         
02562         // Uncompress data in source and save in destination
02563         int status = [ASIHTTPRequest uncompressZippedDataFromSource:source toDestination:dest];
02564         
02565         // Close the files
02566         fclose(dest);
02567         fclose(source);
02568         [inputFileHandle closeFile];
02569         [outputFileHandle closeFile];   
02570         return status;
02571 }
02572 
02573 //
02574 // From the zlib sample code by Mark Adler, code here:
02575 //      http://www.zlib.net/zpipe.c
02576 //
02577 #define CHUNK 16384
02578 
02579 + (int)uncompressZippedDataFromSource:(FILE *)source toDestination:(FILE *)dest
02580 {
02581     int ret;
02582     unsigned have;
02583     z_stream strm;
02584     unsigned char in[CHUNK];
02585     unsigned char out[CHUNK];
02586         
02587     /* allocate inflate state */
02588     strm.zalloc = Z_NULL;
02589     strm.zfree = Z_NULL;
02590     strm.opaque = Z_NULL;
02591     strm.avail_in = 0;
02592     strm.next_in = Z_NULL;
02593     ret = inflateInit2(&strm, (15+32));
02594     if (ret != Z_OK)
02595         return ret;
02596         
02597     /* decompress until deflate stream ends or end of file */
02598     do {
02599         strm.avail_in = fread(in, 1, CHUNK, source);
02600         if (ferror(source)) {
02601             (void)inflateEnd(&strm);
02602             return Z_ERRNO;
02603         }
02604         if (strm.avail_in == 0)
02605             break;
02606         strm.next_in = in;
02607                 
02608         /* run inflate() on input until output buffer not full */
02609         do {
02610             strm.avail_out = CHUNK;
02611             strm.next_out = out;
02612             ret = inflate(&strm, Z_NO_FLUSH);
02613             assert(ret != Z_STREAM_ERROR);  /* state not clobbered */
02614             switch (ret) {
02615                                 case Z_NEED_DICT:
02616                                         ret = Z_DATA_ERROR;     /* and fall through */
02617                                 case Z_DATA_ERROR:
02618                                 case Z_MEM_ERROR:
02619                                         (void)inflateEnd(&strm);
02620                                         return ret;
02621             }
02622             have = CHUNK - strm.avail_out;
02623             if (fwrite(&out, 1, have, dest) != have || ferror(dest)) {
02624                 (void)inflateEnd(&strm);
02625                 return Z_ERRNO;
02626             }
02627         } while (strm.avail_out == 0);
02628                 
02629         /* done when inflate() says it's done */
02630     } while (ret != Z_STREAM_END);
02631         
02632     /* clean up and return */
02633     (void)inflateEnd(&strm);
02634     return ret == Z_STREAM_END ? Z_OK : Z_DATA_ERROR;
02635 }
02636 
02637 
02638 #pragma mark gzip compression
02639 
02640 // Based on this from Robbie Hanson: http://deusty.blogspot.com/2007/07/gzip-compressiondecompression.html
02641 
02642 + (NSData *)compressData:(NSData*)uncompressedData
02643 {
02644         if ([uncompressedData length] == 0) return uncompressedData;
02645         
02646         z_stream strm;
02647         
02648         strm.zalloc = Z_NULL;
02649         strm.zfree = Z_NULL;
02650         strm.opaque = Z_NULL;
02651         strm.total_out = 0;
02652         strm.next_in=(Bytef *)[uncompressedData bytes];
02653         strm.avail_in = [uncompressedData length];
02654         
02655         // Compresssion Levels:
02656         //   Z_NO_COMPRESSION
02657         //   Z_BEST_SPEED
02658         //   Z_BEST_COMPRESSION
02659         //   Z_DEFAULT_COMPRESSION
02660         
02661         if (deflateInit2(&strm, Z_DEFAULT_COMPRESSION, Z_DEFLATED, (15+16), 8, Z_DEFAULT_STRATEGY) != Z_OK) return nil;
02662         
02663         NSMutableData *compressed = [NSMutableData dataWithLength:16384];  // 16K chunks for expansion
02664         
02665         do {
02666                 
02667                 if (strm.total_out >= [compressed length])
02668                         [compressed increaseLengthBy: 16384];
02669                 
02670                 strm.next_out = [compressed mutableBytes] + strm.total_out;
02671                 strm.avail_out = [compressed length] - strm.total_out;
02672                 
02673                 deflate(&strm, Z_FINISH);  
02674                 
02675         } while (strm.avail_out == 0);
02676         
02677         deflateEnd(&strm);
02678         
02679         [compressed setLength: strm.total_out];
02680         return [NSData dataWithData:compressed];
02681 }
02682 
02683 // NOTE: To debug this method, turn off Data Formatters in Xcode or you'll crash on closeFile
02684 + (int)compressDataFromFile:(NSString *)sourcePath toFile:(NSString *)destinationPath
02685 {
02686         // Create an empty file at the destination path
02687         [[NSFileManager defaultManager] createFileAtPath:destinationPath contents:[NSData data] attributes:nil];
02688         
02689         // Get a FILE struct for the source file
02690         NSFileHandle *inputFileHandle = [NSFileHandle fileHandleForReadingAtPath:sourcePath];
02691         FILE *source = fdopen([inputFileHandle fileDescriptor], "r");
02692 
02693         // Get a FILE struct for the destination path
02694         NSFileHandle *outputFileHandle = [NSFileHandle fileHandleForWritingAtPath:destinationPath];
02695         FILE *dest = fdopen([outputFileHandle fileDescriptor], "w");
02696 
02697         // compress data in source and save in destination
02698         int status = [ASIHTTPRequest compressDataFromSource:source toDestination:dest];
02699 
02700         // Close the files
02701         fclose(dest);
02702         fclose(source);
02703         
02704         // We have to close both of these explictly because CFReadStreamCreateForStreamedHTTPRequest() seems to go bonkers otherwise
02705         [inputFileHandle closeFile];
02706         [outputFileHandle closeFile];
02707 
02708         return status;
02709 }
02710 
02711 //
02712 // Also from the zlib sample code  at http://www.zlib.net/zpipe.c
02713 // 
02714 + (int)compressDataFromSource:(FILE *)source toDestination:(FILE *)dest
02715 {
02716     int ret, flush;
02717     unsigned have;
02718     z_stream strm;
02719     unsigned char in[CHUNK];
02720     unsigned char out[CHUNK];
02721         
02722     /* allocate deflate state */
02723     strm.zalloc = Z_NULL;
02724     strm.zfree = Z_NULL;
02725     strm.opaque = Z_NULL;
02726     ret = deflateInit2(&strm, Z_DEFAULT_COMPRESSION, Z_DEFLATED, (15+16), 8, Z_DEFAULT_STRATEGY);
02727     if (ret != Z_OK)
02728         return ret;
02729         
02730     /* compress until end of file */
02731     do {
02732         strm.avail_in = fread(in, 1, CHUNK, source);
02733         if (ferror(source)) {
02734             (void)deflateEnd(&strm);
02735             return Z_ERRNO;
02736         }
02737         flush = feof(source) ? Z_FINISH : Z_NO_FLUSH;
02738         strm.next_in = in;
02739                 
02740         /* run deflate() on input until output buffer not full, finish
02741                  compression if all of source has been read in */
02742         do {
02743             strm.avail_out = CHUNK;
02744             strm.next_out = out;
02745             ret = deflate(&strm, flush);    /* no bad return value */
02746             assert(ret != Z_STREAM_ERROR);  /* state not clobbered */
02747             have = CHUNK - strm.avail_out;
02748             if (fwrite(out, 1, have, dest) != have || ferror(dest)) {
02749                 (void)deflateEnd(&strm);
02750                 return Z_ERRNO;
02751             }
02752         } while (strm.avail_out == 0);
02753         assert(strm.avail_in == 0);     /* all input will be used */
02754                 
02755         /* done when last data in file processed */
02756     } while (flush != Z_FINISH);
02757     assert(ret == Z_STREAM_END);        /* stream will be complete */
02758         
02759     /* clean up and return */
02760     (void)deflateEnd(&strm);
02761     return Z_OK;
02762 }
02763 
02764 #pragma mark get user agent
02765 
02766 + (NSString *)defaultUserAgentString
02767 {
02768         NSBundle *bundle = [NSBundle mainBundle];
02769         
02770         // Attempt to find a name for this application
02771         NSString *appName = [bundle objectForInfoDictionaryKey:@"CFBundleDisplayName"];
02772         if (!appName) {
02773                 appName = [bundle objectForInfoDictionaryKey:@"CFBundleName"];  
02774         }
02775         // If we couldn't find one, we'll give up (and ASIHTTPRequest will use the standard CFNetwork user agent)
02776         if (!appName) {
02777                 return nil;
02778         }
02779         NSString *appVersion = nil;
02780         NSString *marketingVersionNumber = [bundle objectForInfoDictionaryKey:@"CFBundleShortVersionString"];
02781     NSString *developmentVersionNumber = [bundle objectForInfoDictionaryKey:@"CFBundleVersion"];
02782         if (marketingVersionNumber && developmentVersionNumber) {
02783                 if ([marketingVersionNumber isEqualToString:developmentVersionNumber]) {
02784                         appVersion = marketingVersionNumber;
02785                 } else {
02786                         appVersion = [NSString stringWithFormat:@"%@ rv:%@",marketingVersionNumber,developmentVersionNumber];
02787                 }
02788         } else {
02789                 appVersion = (marketingVersionNumber ? marketingVersionNumber : developmentVersionNumber);
02790         }
02791         
02792         
02793         NSString *deviceName;
02794         NSString *OSName;
02795         NSString *OSVersion;
02796         
02797         NSString *locale = [[NSLocale currentLocale] localeIdentifier];
02798         
02799 #if TARGET_OS_IPHONE
02800         UIDevice *device = [UIDevice currentDevice];
02801         deviceName = [device model];
02802         OSName = [device systemName];
02803         OSVersion = [device systemVersion];
02804         
02805 #else
02806         deviceName = @"Macintosh";
02807         OSName = @"Mac OS X";
02808         
02809         // From http://www.cocoadev.com/index.pl?DeterminingOSVersion
02810         // We won't bother to check for systems prior to 10.4, since ASIHTTPRequest only works on 10.5+
02811     OSErr err;
02812     SInt32 versionMajor, versionMinor, versionBugFix;
02813         if ((err = Gestalt(gestaltSystemVersionMajor, &versionMajor)) != noErr) return nil;
02814         if ((err = Gestalt(gestaltSystemVersionMinor, &versionMinor)) != noErr) return nil;
02815         if ((err = Gestalt(gestaltSystemVersionBugFix, &versionBugFix)) != noErr) return nil;
02816         OSVersion = [NSString stringWithFormat:@"%u.%u.%u", versionMajor, versionMinor, versionBugFix];
02817         
02818 #endif
02819         // Takes the form "My Application 1.0 (Macintosh; Mac OS X 10.5.7; en_GB)"
02820         return [NSString stringWithFormat:@"%@ %@ (%@; %@ %@; %@)", appName, appVersion, deviceName, OSName, OSVersion, locale];
02821 }
02822 
02823 #pragma mark proxy autoconfiguration
02824 
02825 // Returns an array of proxies to use for a particular url, given the url of a PAC script
02826 + (NSArray *)proxiesForURL:(NSURL *)theURL fromPAC:(NSURL *)pacScriptURL
02827 {
02828         // From: http://developer.apple.com/samplecode/CFProxySupportTool/listing1.html
02829         // Work around <rdar://problem/5530166>.  This dummy call to 
02830         // CFNetworkCopyProxiesForURL initialise some state within CFNetwork 
02831         // that is required by CFNetworkCopyProxiesForAutoConfigurationScript.
02832         CFRelease(CFNetworkCopyProxiesForURL((CFURLRef)theURL, NULL));
02833         
02834         NSStringEncoding encoding;
02835         NSError *err = nil;
02836         NSString *script = [NSString stringWithContentsOfURL:pacScriptURL usedEncoding:&encoding error:&err];
02837         if (err) {
02838                 return nil;
02839         }
02840         // Obtain the list of proxies by running the autoconfiguration script
02841 #if TARGET_IPHONE_SIMULATOR && __IPHONE_OS_VERSION_MIN_REQUIRED < __IPHONE_3_0
02842         NSArray *proxies = [(NSArray *)CFNetworkCopyProxiesForAutoConfigurationScript((CFStringRef)script,(CFURLRef)theURL) autorelease];
02843 #else
02844         CFErrorRef err2 = NULL;
02845         NSArray *proxies = [(NSArray *)CFNetworkCopyProxiesForAutoConfigurationScript((CFStringRef)script,(CFURLRef)theURL, &err2) autorelease];
02846         if (err2) {
02847                 return nil;
02848         }
02849 #endif
02850         return proxies;
02851 }
02852 
02853 #pragma mark mime-type detection
02854 
02855 + (NSString *)mimeTypeForFileAtPath:(NSString *)path
02856 {
02857         // NSTask does seem to exist in the 2.2.1 SDK, though it's not in the 3.0 SDK. It's probably best if we just use a generic mime type on iPhone all the time.
02858 #if TARGET_OS_IPHONE
02859         return @"application/octet-stream";
02860         
02861         // Grab the mime type using an NSTask to run the 'file' program, with the Mac OS-specific parameters to grab the mime type
02862         // Perhaps there is a better way to do this?
02863 #else
02864         NSTask *task = [[[NSTask alloc] init] autorelease];
02865         [task setLaunchPath: @"/usr/bin/file"];
02866         [task setArguments:[NSMutableArray arrayWithObjects:@"-Ib",path,nil]];
02867         
02868     NSPipe *outputPipe = [NSPipe pipe];
02869     [task setStandardOutput:outputPipe];
02870         
02871     NSFileHandle *file = [outputPipe fileHandleForReading];
02872         
02873         [task launch];
02874         [task waitUntilExit];
02875         
02876         if ([task terminationStatus] != 0) {
02877                 return @"application/octet-stream";     
02878         }
02879         
02880         NSString *mimeTypeString = [[[[NSString alloc] initWithData:[file readDataToEndOfFile] encoding: NSUTF8StringEncoding] autorelease] stringByReplacingOccurrencesOfString:@"\n" withString:@""];
02881         return [[mimeTypeString componentsSeparatedByString:@";"] objectAtIndex:0];
02882 #endif
02883 }
02884 
02885 #pragma mark bandwidth measurement / throttling
02886 
02887 + (BOOL)isBandwidthThrottled
02888 {
02889 #if TARGET_OS_IPHONE
02890         [bandwidthThrottlingLock lock];
02891 
02892         BOOL throttle = isBandwidthThrottled || (!shouldThrottleBandwithForWWANOnly && (maxBandwidthPerSecond));
02893         [bandwidthThrottlingLock unlock];
02894         return throttle;
02895 #else
02896         [bandwidthThrottlingLock lock];
02897         BOOL throttle = (maxBandwidthPerSecond);
02898         [bandwidthThrottlingLock unlock];
02899         return throttle;
02900 #endif
02901 }
02902 
02903 + (unsigned long)maxBandwidthPerSecond
02904 {
02905         [bandwidthThrottlingLock lock];
02906         unsigned long amount = maxBandwidthPerSecond;
02907         [bandwidthThrottlingLock unlock];
02908         return amount;
02909 }
02910 
02911 + (void)setMaxBandwidthPerSecond:(unsigned long)bytes
02912 {
02913         [bandwidthThrottlingLock lock];
02914         maxBandwidthPerSecond = bytes;
02915         [bandwidthThrottlingLock unlock];
02916 }
02917 
02918 + (void)incrementBandwidthUsedInLastSecond:(unsigned long)bytes
02919 {
02920         [bandwidthThrottlingLock lock];
02921         bandwidthUsedInLastSecond += bytes;
02922         //NSLog(@"used in last second: %lu",bandwidthUsedInLastSecond);
02923         [bandwidthThrottlingLock unlock];
02924 }
02925 
02926 + (void)recordBandwidthUsage
02927 {
02928         if (bandwidthUsedInLastSecond == 0) {
02929                 [bandwidthUsageTracker removeAllObjects];
02930         } else {
02931                 NSTimeInterval interval = [bandwidthMeasurementDate timeIntervalSinceNow];
02932                 while ((interval < 0 || [bandwidthUsageTracker count] > 5) && [bandwidthUsageTracker count] > 0) {
02933                         [bandwidthUsageTracker removeObjectAtIndex:0];
02934                         interval++;
02935                 }
02936         }
02937         //NSLog(@"Used: %qi",bandwidthUsedInLastSecond);
02938         [bandwidthUsageTracker addObject:[NSNumber numberWithUnsignedLong:bandwidthUsedInLastSecond]];
02939         [bandwidthMeasurementDate release];
02940         bandwidthMeasurementDate = [[NSDate dateWithTimeIntervalSinceNow:1] retain];
02941         bandwidthUsedInLastSecond = 0;
02942         
02943         int measurements = [bandwidthUsageTracker count];
02944         unsigned long long totalBytes = 0;
02945         for (NSNumber *bytes in bandwidthUsageTracker) {
02946                 totalBytes += [bytes unsignedLongValue];
02947         }
02948         averageBandwidthUsedPerSecond = totalBytes/measurements;                
02949 }
02950 
02951 + (unsigned long)averageBandwidthUsedPerSecond
02952 {
02953         [bandwidthThrottlingLock lock];
02954         
02955         if (!bandwidthMeasurementDate || [bandwidthMeasurementDate timeIntervalSinceNow] < 0) {
02956                 [self recordBandwidthUsage];
02957         }
02958         unsigned long amount =  averageBandwidthUsedPerSecond;
02959         [bandwidthThrottlingLock unlock];
02960         return amount;
02961 }
02962 
02963 + (void)measureBandwidthUsage
02964 {
02965         // Other requests may have to wait for this lock if we're sleeping, but this is fine, since in that case we already know they shouldn't be sending or receiving data
02966         [bandwidthThrottlingLock lock];
02967 
02968         if (!bandwidthMeasurementDate || [bandwidthMeasurementDate timeIntervalSinceNow] < -0) {
02969                 [self recordBandwidthUsage];
02970         }
02971         
02972         // Are we performing bandwidth throttling?
02973         if (maxBandwidthPerSecond > 0) {        
02974                 // How much data can we still send or receive this second?
02975                 long long bytesRemaining = (long long)maxBandwidthPerSecond - (long long)bandwidthUsedInLastSecond;
02976                                 
02977                 // Have we used up our allowance?
02978                 if (bytesRemaining < 8) {
02979                         
02980                         // Yes, put this request to sleep until a second is up
02981                         [NSThread sleepUntilDate:bandwidthMeasurementDate];
02982                         [self recordBandwidthUsage];
02983                 }
02984         }
02985         [bandwidthThrottlingLock unlock];
02986 }
02987 
02988 #if TARGET_OS_IPHONE
02989 + (void)setShouldThrottleBandwidthForWWAN:(BOOL)throttle
02990 {
02991         if (throttle) {
02992                 [ASIHTTPRequest throttleBandwidthForWWANUsingLimit:ASIWWANBandwidthThrottleAmount];
02993         } else {
02994                 [[NSNotificationCenter defaultCenter] removeObserver:self name:@"kNetworkReachabilityChangedNotification" object:nil];
02995                 [ASIHTTPRequest setMaxBandwidthPerSecond:0];
02996                 [bandwidthThrottlingLock lock];
02997                 shouldThrottleBandwithForWWANOnly = NO;
02998                 [bandwidthThrottlingLock unlock];
02999         }
03000 }
03001 
03002 + (void)throttleBandwidthForWWANUsingLimit:(unsigned long)limit
03003 {       
03004         [bandwidthThrottlingLock lock];
03005         shouldThrottleBandwithForWWANOnly = YES;
03006         maxBandwidthPerSecond = limit;
03007         [[Reachability sharedReachability] setNetworkStatusNotificationsEnabled:YES];
03008         [[NSNotificationCenter defaultCenter] addObserver:self selector:@selector(reachabilityChanged:) name:@"kNetworkReachabilityChangedNotification" object:nil];
03009         [bandwidthThrottlingLock unlock];
03010         [ASIHTTPRequest reachabilityChanged:nil];
03011 }
03012 
03013 + (void)reachabilityChanged:(NSNotification *)note
03014 {
03015         [bandwidthThrottlingLock lock]; 
03016         if ([[Reachability sharedReachability] internetConnectionStatus] == ReachableViaCarrierDataNetwork) {
03017                 isBandwidthThrottled = YES;
03018         } else {
03019                 isBandwidthThrottled = NO;
03020         }
03021         [bandwidthThrottlingLock unlock];
03022 }
03023 #endif
03024 
03025 + (unsigned long)maxUploadReadLength
03026 {
03027 
03028         [bandwidthThrottlingLock lock];
03029         
03030         // We'll split our bandwidth allowance into 4 (which is the default for an ASINetworkQueue's max concurrent operations count) to give all running requests a fighting chance of reading data this cycle
03031         long long toRead = maxBandwidthPerSecond/4;
03032         if (maxBandwidthPerSecond > 0 && (bandwidthUsedInLastSecond + toRead > maxBandwidthPerSecond)) {
03033                 toRead = maxBandwidthPerSecond-bandwidthUsedInLastSecond;
03034                 if (toRead < 0) {
03035                         toRead = 0;
03036                 }
03037         }
03038 
03039         if (toRead == 0 || !bandwidthMeasurementDate || [bandwidthMeasurementDate timeIntervalSinceNow] < -0) {
03040                 [NSThread sleepUntilDate:bandwidthMeasurementDate];
03041                 [self recordBandwidthUsage];
03042         }
03043         [bandwidthThrottlingLock unlock];       
03044         return toRead;
03045 }

03052         return isiPhoneOS2;

03054 
03055 // From: http://www.cocoadev.com/index.pl?BaseSixtyFour
03056 
03057 + (NSString*)base64forData:(NSData*)theData {
03058         
03059         const uint8_t* input = (const uint8_t*)[theData bytes];
03060         NSInteger length = [theData length];
03061         
03062     static char table[] = "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789+/=";
03063         
03064     NSMutableData* data = [NSMutableData dataWithLength:((length + 2) / 3) * 4];
03065     uint8_t* output = (uint8_t*)data.mutableBytes;
03066         
03067     for (NSInteger i = 0; i < length; i += 3) {
03068         NSInteger value = 0;
03069         for (NSInteger j = i; j < (i + 3); j++) {
03070             value <<= 8;
03071                         
03072             if (j < length) {
03073                 value |= (0xFF & input[j]);
03074             }
03075         }
03076                 
03077         NSInteger index = (i / 3) * 4;
03078         output[index + 0] =                    table[(value >> 18) & 0x3F];
03079         output[index + 1] =                    table[(value >> 12) & 0x3F];
03080         output[index + 2] = (i + 1) < length ? table[(value >> 6)  & 0x3F] : '=';
03081         output[index + 3] = (i + 2) < length ? table[(value >> 0)  & 0x3F] : '=';
03082     }
03083         
03084     return [[[NSString alloc] initWithData:data encoding:NSASCIIStringEncoding] autorelease];
03085 }
